msg.msgText: Messaging policy {0} is pending deletion. It cannot be used by the endpoint that is being created or updated.

msgExplanation.p: A command has been issued to create or update an endpoint to which a messaging policy which is pending deletion is applied. The messaging policy cannot be used by the endpoint.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the messaging policy applied to the endpoint that is being created or updated is not pending deletion.
